text: When this man heard that Jesus had come out of Judea into Galilee, he went to Him and implored Him to come down and heal his son,The man was asking Jesus to make an emergency hike of some 25 miles (unless he was mounted and had brought an extra horse for Jesus; but He probably wasn't used to riding). Evidently he figured that the healer had to be physically present. for he was about to die.
